config.title: Header Style 01

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 14px/1.35 PT Sans, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 400 12px/1.35 PT Sans, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 PT Sans, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-01 has-after" /> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-6 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-9 header-panel-middle header-search-wrap" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-10 col-md-12 col-lg-9 header-panel-right" /> </container> </referenceContainer>
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<move element="utilities.toggle.linkslist" destination="header-panel-left" before="-" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="header-links-list" destination="utilities.sidebar.left" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-panel-middle" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-panel-middle" /> <move element="minicart" destination="links.features.cart" />
<move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-container-inner" after="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
